text: The New Jersey General Assembly is the lower house of the New Jersey Legislature. The Assembly has been made up of 80 members. Two members are elected from each of New Jersey's 40 legislative districts for a term of two years.Statistical Data Tables , New Jersey Apportionment Commission. Accessed August 25, 2021. ==References== ==Other websites== *New Jersey Legislature official website *Assembly Democrats official website *Assembly Republicans official website *New Jersey section of Project Vote Smart, a national database of voting records and other information about legislators. Category:New Jersey Category:State lower houses in the United States
title: New Jersey General Assembly
